Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the existence of plans by the Trump administration to construct a monument hailing the end of the War on Christmas. No such plans have been announced or planned.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as there is no evidence or official announcement of the Trump administration planning to construct such a monument.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that there was a "War on Christmas" and that it has ended, which is a contentious and subjective assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that no plans for a monument exist.
